body:
Comment 13 by **Kalthorn**: 
Maybe Wintrust could be useful?  I'm totally out of my depth here.

This link looks like it has a couple of possible routes to take...
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa388209%28v=vs.85%29.aspx

...but it also recommends this method for going through a chain:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa376078%28v=vs.85%29.aspx
